list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: reconfigured version control. Removed uncompleted code

task.summary: Default task
Added a table layout to show the strings that the user has encoded.
Removed TODO: Items that had been completed and renamed variables in LevelFragment to improve readability

Added a button to check your answer in the level.
I have also made it so that after one of the encode or check answer buttons are pressed the corresponding editText empties its contents
updated library dependencies in app build.gradle

refactored the layout of files to reflect features that the directories hold. Added the main menu.
Added a companion object to Level Activity to format the intent for to start the activity. Added the main menu and level selection fragments and attach them to the mainActivity
Created the database package containing the Entity, DAO, and Database classes (implement by room persistence library) Added a Model class to work from later
Created the repository class

LARGE COMMIT: Added the Encoding_objects package to the model package. Started hooking elements into each other.
Note: This version will Likely not run, but does build without warnings. All changes have yet to be tested. Changes include: - Entity class now builds. Primary key is now a parameter for constructor - Repository has method signatures for both methods used and implementation for one - Encoder interface has been created, EncoderFactory has been created. EncoderLevel1 has been created. None are in their final form - Model has been implemented as far as it can be with other components in their current state - LevelActivity has been hooked into Model - build.gradle has new dependencies and incremental annotation processing added to support liveData and the annotation processing that the Room Persistence library requires
Finished the insert method of the repository and finished implementing EncoderLevel1.kt and the Encoder interface
LevelActivity now gets the level from its starting Intent and passes that to the model
created the about app fragment and the instructions fragment
updated the InstructionsFragment to not take parameters from the newInstance Method
updated the AboutAppFragment to not take parameters from the newInstance Method

added function to open About app and Instructions fragments. fixed various issues causing crashes including: - Mismatching method signatures and calling signatures - Added a missing @JvmStatic annotation -
Created tests for EncoderLevel 1
added a test case for EncoderLevel1

Added tests for the database.
Edited Entity class to run properly with room library Implemented coroutines in LevelActivity
The LevelFragment now directly observes data from the Model

Created the EncoderStateLevel 2 through 8. Updated EncoderFactory.kt to return proper state. Refactored EncoderState.kt to be abstract and implement some of the methods that were being implemented by other classes when it was just an interface.
Optimized import statements
Implemented and tested the encode method of EncoderStateLevel3.kt
Created and implemented a test for EncoderStateLevel2.kt
Created and implemented a test for EncoderStateLevel5.kt
Moved EncoderStateLevel tests to non-instrumented test folder. Implemented EncoderStateLevel5.kt and EncoderStateLevel5Test.kt
Implemented EncoderStateLevel5Test.kt
updated the hints.xml file
Implemented EncoderStateLevel6.kt and created and implemented EncoderStateLevel6Test.kt
